channel.title: [PI] Item Reqirements problum [pi] Pics Included
channel.description:
Ok so my server will let u wear skillcapes at one and i want to fix that so heres my First code i tryed ItemAssistant.java [code] case 9748: // Skillcape c.attackLevelReq = 99; return; [/code]
Didnt work so i tryed this code [code]case 9748: // Skillcape if(c.playerLevel[1] >= 99) return; else if (c.playerLevel[1] <= 98) c.sendMessage("You must have an Attack Level of 99 to wear this!");break; [/code]
And this didnt work so heres Pictures to show
[IMG]http://i801.photobucket.com/albums/yy294/Jcor9/110611-161147.jpg[/img]
Iv been working on this for about 2-3 days so then i got pissed and started working on my 562 server
Edit: The first code looks like it should just when i put in here it got all messed up

item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

[quote=“JCor9, post:7, topic:398807”]i could do that, isnt that just going into itemprices and changing to zero?[/quote]yes make sure its 0 in prices.txt and also in item.cfg

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Item Reqirements problum [pi] Pics Included
item.dc:creator: @Loveandpower Loveandpower
item.description:
@Loveandpower wrote:

Your client will freeze when you have cash ready. One cheaphax is to just make it so skillcapes do not cost anything.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Item Reqirements problum [pi] Pics Included
item.dc:creator: @ApocalypseX ApocalypseX
item.description:
@ApocalypseX wrote:

JCor9:

Thats always will work but one of the capes the in the old wise store is nulled cuz when go to get cape on my owner account he frezes client but when i do it on my test account i can get one but ill figure out the null and thank u repped

Thank you.
You can go through I think shopmanager, and find what code the cape is (most likely summoning/dungeoneering/hunter) and either add it in to your client or remove it temporarily.

Read full topic

item.title: [PI] Item Reqirements problum [pi] Pics Included
item.dc:creator: @ApocalypseX ApocalypseX
item.description:
@ApocalypseX wrote:

Listen, instead of fixing that, work around it.
Make it to where you can only obtain one through shops, and make it untradable/unstakable.
Like on PI, you have the Wise Old Man where you HAVE to have 99 in order to even SEE the cape.
That way that’s the only way you can obtain one.

Read full topic

make sure that “attack” is not being used for another item.

item.title: [PI] Item Reqirements problum [pi] Pics Included
item.dc:creator: @JCor9 JCor9
item.description:
@JCor9 wrote:

Ok so my server will let u wear skillcapes at one and i want to fix that so heres my First code i tryed
ItemAssistant.java

case 9748: // Skillcape c.attackLevelReq = 99; return;

Didnt work so i tryed this code

case 9748: // Skillcape if(c.playerLevel[1] >= 99) return; else if (c.playerLevel[1] <= 98) c.sendMessage("You must have an Attack Level of 99 to wear this!");break;

And this didnt work so heres Pictures to show

Iv been working on this for about 2-3 days so then i got pissed and started working on my 562 server

Edit: The first code looks like it should just when i put in here it got all messed up
